jira_tickets.- Description: Investigate and implement features to align the solution with Telstra's agile work environment, such as support for different types of agile meetings and ceremonies.
jira_tickets.- Acceptance Criteria: The solution should provide features that are tailored to agile work practices and support different types of agile meetings. It should integrate seamlessly with Telstra's existing agile tools and workflows.

jira_tickets.- Description: Develop functionality to use the transcripts of past meetings as context to generate more accurate and valuable output for future meetings.
jira_tickets.- Acceptance Criteria: The solution should analyze past meeting transcripts and use the context to generate meeting outputs that are tailored to the specific meeting type. The generated output should provide valuable insights and recommendations based on the accumulated knowledge from past meetings.

jira_tickets.- Description: Create a centralized dashboard to manage and track all meetings and their associated artifacts, providing a seamless experience for users.
jira_tickets.- Acceptance Criteria: The dashboard should allow users to easily schedule, manage, and track meetings. It should provide visibility into meeting details, attendees, agenda, and generated outputs. The dashboard should also support integration with Telstra's existing tools and systems.

jira_tickets.- Description: Explore the possibility of integrating Telstra's solution with Copilot, tailoring it to meet specific business needs and leveraging the existing platform.
jira_tickets.- Acceptance Criteria: The integration with Copilot should allow Telstra's solution to complement and enhance the functionalities provided by Copilot. The integration should be seamless and provide added value to Telstra's users. Customization options should be explored to align with Telstra's unique requirements.

jira_tickets.- Description: Modify the meeting minutes feature to align with different meeting types, such as retros, stand-ups, and ceremonies, to provide more relevant and useful outputs.
jira_tickets.- Acceptance Criteria: The meeting minutes feature should be enhanced to adapt to different meeting types and generate meeting summaries that are tailored to the specific purpose of the meeting. The tailored meeting minutes should provide key highlights, action items, and insights based on the discussions and outcomes of each meeting type.

user_story.1. Requirement: As an agile team member, I want a solution that automates the generation of meeting minutes tailored for different types of agile ceremonies, such as retros, stand-ups, and planning sessions, so that I can easily capture and document the outcomes and action items of each meeting.
user_story.2. Requirement: As a project manager, I want a solution that integrates with Copilot and enhances its features with Telstra-specific functionalities, such as generating and updating tickets, so that I can effectively manage the Agile workflow and ensure seamless collaboration within the team.
user_story.3. Requirement: As a Telstra executive, I want a solution that provides a centralized dashboard with real-time updates on the progress of all agile meetings and ceremonies, so that I can have a comprehensive view of the project activities and make informed decisions.
user_story.4. Requirement: As a Telstra employee, I want an agile project management tool that focuses on integrating and improving the agile workflow, reducing time-consuming administrative tasks, and enhances employee experience, so that I can fully embrace the Agile methodology and work more efficiently.
user_story.5. Requirement: As a product owner, I want a solution that leverages AI and machine learning to analyze and extract insights from agile meetings' transcripts and generate reports highlighting key trends, challenges, and opportunities, so that I can make data-driven decisions to improve team performance and project outcomes.
